integer, intent(inout) :: array(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: left, right
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    i = left

    do
        do while (array(i) < pivot) i = i +1
        end do
        do while (array(j) > pivot)

        end do
        if (i <=j) then

            array(i) = array(j)
            array(j) = temp 
            i =i +1
            j =j -1
        end if
        if (i >j ) exit
    end do
    if (left < j) call quicksort(array, left, j)

subroutine quicksort(array, left, right)
    integer, intent(inout) :: array(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: left, right
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    i = left
    j = right
    pivot = array((left + right)/2)
    
    do
        do while (array(i) < pivot)
            i = i +1
        end do
        do while (array(j) > pivot)
            j= j -1
        end do
        if (i <=j) then
            temp = array(i)
            array(i) = array(j)
            array(j) = temp 
            i =i +1
            j =j -1
        end if
        if (i >j ) exit
    end do
    if (left < j) call quicksort(array, left, j)
    if (i < right) call quicksort(array, i, right)
end subroutine

module SolveModule

subroutine quicksort(array, left, right)
    integer, intent(inout) :: array(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: left, right
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    i = left
    j = right
    pivot = array((left + right)/2)
    
    do
        do while (array(i) < pivot)
            i = i +1
        end do
        do while (array(j) > pivot)
            j= j -1
        end do
        if (i <=j) then
            temp = array(i)
            array(i) = array(j)
            array(j) = temp 
            i =i +1
            j =j -1
        end if
        if (i >j ) exit
    end do
    if (left < j) call quicksort(array, left, j)
    if (i < right) call quicksort(array, i, right)
end subroutine

pure function solve(arr) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:)
    integer :: res
    integer :: i, n, target, mid, l, r, cur, pos, q, temp, j
    integer(8) :: cnt, total, s
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: sorted
    integer(8), dimension(:), allocatable :: bit

    n = size(arr, dim=1)
    allocate(sorted(n))
    sorted = arr
    call quicksort(sorted, 1, n)

    total = n*(n+1)/2
    l = 1
    r = n

    do while (l < r)
        mid = l + (r - l)/2
        target = sorted(mid)
        allocate(bit(0:2*n +1))
        bit = 0_8  ! Initialize to zero

        ! Initial setup for BIT array:
        integer :: x_init
        x_init = n + 1
        x = x_init
        do
            if (x > 2*n +1) exit
            bit(x) = bit(x) +1
            temp = iand(x, -x)
            x = x + temp
        end do

        cur = 0
        cnt =0_8

        do i =1, n  ! loop over each element of the original input
            if (arr(i) <= target) then
                cur = cur +1
            else
                cur = cur -1
            end if

            ! Update the BIT array:
            pos = cur + n +1  ! position in Fenwick Tree
            x = pos  ! start at pos and go up
            do
                if (x > 2*n +1) exit
                bit(x) = bit(x) +1_8
                temp = iand(x, -x)
                x =x + temp
            end do

            ! Query the Fenwick Tree:
            q = cur +n 
            x = q
            s =0_8
            do
                if (x <1 ) exit
                s = s + bit(x)
                temp = iand(x, -x)
                x = x - temp
            end do

            cnt = cnt + s
        end do  ! finished processing all elements

        ! Check condition
        if (cnt >= (total /2) +1 ) then
            r = mid
        else
            l = mid +1
        end if
        deallocate(bit)
    end do  ! end binary search

    if (l == r ) then
        res = sorted(l)
    else
        res = sorted(l)  ! shouldn't happen if loop preserved l <= r
    end if
end function solve

end module SolveModule
